Pipeline & 
Coverage

FY22 Attainment: 16.95%
•
Q2 Target: $1,127k
•
Q2 Closed / Won QTD: $6k
•
Q2 Attainment: 1%
•
Q2 Forecast: $392k – $538k
•
Won 6k in May
•
Forecasting 132k in June
•
Forecasting 253k – 400 in July
•
Q2 Forecasted Attainment: 34.6% – 47.7%

•

$525k

Outline
Sales KPIs Going forward and Opportunity Management Expectations Going Forward
•
AE Pipeline Target
•
100k weekly / 430k monthly
•
AE Pipeline Coverage Target
•
2x CQ
•
3x CQ+1
•
4x CQ+2
•
In the absence of PipeGen, activity needs to be shown:
•
Outreach: use sequences, use email tracking, etc.
•
Copy RVP on email
•
AE Attainment Taget
•
100% + strong linearity.
•
M3 only deals is unacceptable
•
Updated opportunities as they progress. 
•
When something happens, reflect it on the 
opportunity.
•
MEDDPICC included
•
End of week isn’t enough anymore.
•
Once an SQL (Stage 0) created, 48 hours to update
•
Indicate date, time, and attendees and known 
pain
•
No more Stage 1 opps in your pipeline >30 days
Sales KPIsOpportunity Management Expectations

Solid
Removed
Triangles
Solid
Grid as triangles to create cube
30 degree angle
Outline
How to Slack!
•
Keyboard Short Cuts: https://slack.com/help/articles/201374536-Slack-keyboard-shortcuts
•
Cmnd + K = Quick Switch
•
Cmnd + Shift + K = Browse DMs
•
Cmnd + U = Upload document
•
/ = kick off a command; Remind me!  
•
Naming conventions [bae-accounts-XXX], [bae-core], [bae], etc.
•
Alerts / Notifications
•
Folders / Sections
•
General Ettiquette: https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack
•
THREADS
•
Responses 

Solid
Removed
Triangles
Solid
Grid as triangles to create cube
30 degree angle
Outline
Next Steps Standardization
1.From newest to oldest next step
2.Always start with the date of the next step
3.Next step description should be sharp and to the point
4.Clearly identified owners for every next step
5.Next steps provided every week for every in-quarter opportunity
Next steps provide qualitative deal insights

Solid
Removed
Triangles
Solid
Grid as triangles to create cube
30 degree angle
Outline
Commit > Most Likely > Best Case 
Probability of winning deal in current period
Best 
Case
Most 
Likely
Commit
“Upside”
LowHigh

Solid
Removed
Triangles
Solid
Grid as triangles to create cube
30 degree angle
Outline
Each represents a different probability of winning
TypeDefinition
Probability of winning 
deal in current period
Commit
Opportunities that you are confident to close this quarter
This is a number that you rarely miss
High
Most Likely
Open opportunities that require realistic and achievable 
actions to close this quarter
Closest to the pin
Moderate
Best Case
Deals where some additional effort is required to close 
this quarter
A number rarely exceeded
Low
“Upside”
